mapper.insert: insert into gameArchive(game_name, md5, user_id, archive_path, save_time) values (#{gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{archivePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) on duplicate key update md5 = values(md5), archive_path = values(archive_path), save_time = values(save_time)
